title: For a Query about 5 EPIC MYSTERY SKINS!!!
body:
So guys I'm here, as we know, the preseason update will compensate us one epic mystery skin for every 4 rune pages bought by RP before. I got 20 rune pages so I should receive 5 EPIC MYSTERY SKINS right? Unfortunately, I didn't  get anyone after I completed the mission, and I know I owned all available skins but I still think Riot should compensate those RP we paid for rune pages with something like chest that contains guaranteed skin permanent for those players have owned all skins!
I'm just wondering is there anyone else met the same situation like me, we really need Riot's help~~

Following is my screenshot:
[https://i.imgur.com/zelJ079.png]

Thank you for your time!

replies.body: Probably the best chance that you have at getting this resolved is by submitting a ticket via [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). I couldn't say what they'd do, or suggest, but it *should* get a process started that will work towards a resolution.

Sometimes the notification that lets you know what you got might've bugged out.  Can you try checking your account in either of the two ways below?  If it shows that you didn't get your skins, please send in a player support ticket so we can get your case fixed.
1. Click on the notification button (under the X For closing your client and above your friend's list) and open up any of the gifting events.  You should see a pop-up with the epics you received.
2. Go to the Store > then click on "Account" (circular button next to the Purchase RP button) > Purchase History on the far left > Gifting History below purchase history
I also did not receive the one mystery skin I was supposed to get and I checked both of those locations and there's nothing there
I have all skins too in store and legacy, got nothing from the quest either.
Can you let us know what they do, because I'd be curious to know :)
You would got four because you start with two.
